Requirement: The system shall include an actuator for controlling the opening and closing of windows in a smart home
The actuators used in the IoT system shall comply with safety regulations to prevent harm or injury to users
When a shot is marked as a miss  the product shall simulate the sound of a shot missing its target.
The product shall comply with regulations governing the energy efficiency of actuator devices
When the offensive player takes a shot  the product shall simulate the sound of a ship at sea.
The actuators must be highly configurable for use with various database management systems for the end users
The actuator shall be capable of adjusting its position within 5 milliseconds
When a ship is sunk  the product shall simulate the sound of a sinking ship.
The system should warn ECA users about the malfunction of the system.
The system shall have high availability every day of the year.The system must be available for use between 12:00AM and 6:00PM all days of the year.
The product shall simulate the look of ships at sea.
